import { useState } from 'react'; import './app.css'; import { Backspace } from '@material-ui/icons'; function App() { const [result, setResult] = useState([]); const addItem = (e) => { setResult(result.concat(e.target.name)); }; const Hclear = () => { setResult([]); }; const findResult = (e) => { setResult([eval(result.join(''))]); }; return ( <>
); } export default App;
